title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\PatchJob
name: PatchJob
description:
A high level representation of a patch job that is either in progress or has completed.

Instance details are not included in the job. To paginate through instance details, use ListPatchJobInstanceDetails. For more information about patch jobs, see Creating patch jobs.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.PatchJob

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Unique identifier for this patch job in the form projects/*/patchJobs/*

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Display name for this patch job. This is not a unique identifier.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Description of the patch job. Length of the description is limited to 1024 characters.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Time this patch job was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Last time this patch job was updated.

params.name: data.state
params.description: The current state of the PatchJob.

params.name: data.instance_filter
params.description: Instances to patch.

params.name: data.patch_config
params.description: Patch configuration being applied.

params.name: data.duration
params.description: Duration of the patch job. After the duration ends, the patch job times out.

params.name: data.instance_details_summary
params.description: Summary of instance details.

params.name: data.dry_run
params.description: If this patch job is a dry run, the agent reports that it has finished without running any updates on the VM instance.

params.name: data.error_message
params.description: If this patch job failed, this message provides information about the failure.

params.name: data.percent_complete
params.description: Reflects the overall progress of the patch job in the range of 0.0 being no progress to 100.0 being complete.

params.name: data.patch_deployment
params.description: Output only. Name of the patch deployment that created this patch job.

params.name: data.rollout
params.description: Rollout strategy being applied.
